name: Livechat
tagline: A complete chat suite for CraftBukkit.
body:
### Welcome to LiveChat's documentation page.
**Current version:** 1.1.0.

***

* This plugin requires [Vault](http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/vault/) ([GitHub page](https://github.com/KittehOrg/TagAPI)).
* If you want to see color tags over player heads you need to install [TagAPI](http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/tag/) ([GitHub page](https://github.com/KittehOrg/TagAPI)).

_More information & **downloads** coming soon._
